None.Name: Mischievous Aura
None.Description: Needs 4 seconds to create a destructive aura of 30m radius where playing out cards will backlash. Every card played out will also deal 5 times their power costs x their era as area damage to hostile and friendly units. Lasts for 40 seconds. Reusable every 40 seconds.
